alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 4:26AM AKST until November 24 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze to one tenth of an inch of ice. * WHERE...Susitna Valley. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will hover near the freezing mark for most areas early this morning, then slowly rise through the day. Even with air temperatures above freezing, rain can freeze when hitting cold road and sidewalk surfaces. Areas north of Talkeetna could see a mix of snow and freezing rain, with little or no snow accumulation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
